eventId.description: A unique identifier for an event in the event log.

timestamp.description: The specific time when the event occurred, formatted in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ).

content.description: A detailed description of what the event entails.
content.value: Customer Interaction - Discussion about upcoming delivery schedule

actor.description: The actor who created this event.

role.description: The role of the actor who created this event.

name.description: The name of the actor who created this event.

interactionType.description: The type of interaction or event being logged.

context.description: Additional context relevant to the event, such as customer, route, plan, and truck details.

customerId.description: A unique identifier for the customer associated with the event.

routeId.description: A unique identifier for the route associated with the event.

planId.description: A unique identifier for the plan associated with the event.

truckId.description: A unique identifier for the truck associated with the event.
